div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1297 Mytilene, Lesbos, 1937 (721a) Burial: c. 240 B.C. (M) Contents: c. 300 AR and AE Methymna: 2+ hemidr. (as BMC 12 ff.) Mytilene: 2+ hemidr. (as BMC 32 ff.) 2+ AR fr. 133+ AE (as BMC 37 ff. [132+]; 96 ff. [1+]) Disposition: dispersed Information from W. Schwabacher
